Allow Anonymous Usage Reporting?: 允許匿名的使用資訊回報？
Any devices configured on an introducer: Any devices configured on an introducer device will be added to this device as well.
Comment, when used at the start of a lin: 註解，當輸入在一行的開頭時
Compression is recommended in most setup: 建議在大多數的設置中使用壓縮。
Copyright © 2014 Jakob Borg and the foll: 版權所有 © 2014 Jakob Borg 及以下貢獻者：
Enter comma separated \"ip:port\" addres: 輸入以半形逗號區隔的 "ip:連接埠" 位址，或著輸入 "dynamic" 以進行位址的自動探索
輸入忽略樣式，每行一種。
File permission bits are ignored when lo: 當在尋找變化時，檔案權限位元會被忽略。用於 FAT 檔案系統。
Files are moved to date stamped versions: 當檔案被 syncthing 取代或刪除時，它們將被移至 .stversions 資料夾並添加日期戳記。
Files are protected from changes made on: Files are protected from changes made on other devices, but changes made on this device will be sent to the rest of the cluster.
Inversion of the given condition (i.e. d: 反轉給定條件 (即：不要排除)
Multi level wildcard (matches multiple d: 多階層萬用字元 (可比對多層資料夾)
Path to the folder on the local computer: Path to the folder on the local computer. Will be created if it does not exist. The tilde character (~) can be used as a shortcut for
Path where versions should be stored (le: Path where versions should be stored (leave empty for the default .stversions folder in the folder).
Quick guide to supported patterns: 可支援樣式的快速指南
Select the devices to share this folder: Select the devices to share this folder with.
Short identifier for the folder. Must be: Short identifier for the folder. Must be the same on all cluster devices.
Shown instead of Device ID in the cluste: Shown instead of Device ID in the cluster status. Will be advertised to other devices as an optional default name.
Shown instead of Device ID in the cluster status. Will be updated to the name the device advertises if left empty.
Single level wildcard (matches within a: 單階層萬用字元 (只在單個資料夾階層內比對)
Sync Protocol Listen Addresses: 同步通訊協定監聽位址
Syncthing includes the following softwar: Syncthing 包括以下軟體或其中的一部分：
Syncthing seems to be down, or there is: Syncthing 似乎下線了，或者您的網際網路連線出現問題。正在重試...
The configuration has been saved but not: 組態已經儲存但尚未啟用。Syncthing 必須重新啟動以便啟用新的組態。
The device ID cannot be blank.
The device ID to enter here can be found: The device ID to enter here can be found in the "Edit > Show ID" dialog on the other device. Spaces and dashes are optional (ignored).
The encrypted usage report is sent daily: The encrypted usage report is sent daily. It is used to track common platforms, folder sizes and app versions. If the reported data set is changed you will be prompted with this dialog again.
The entered device ID does not look vali: The entered device ID does not look valid. It should be a 52 or 56 character string consisting of letters and numbers, with spaces and dashes being optional.
The folder ID cannot be blank.
The folder ID must be a short identifier: The folder ID must be a short identifier (64 characters or less) consisting of letters, numbers and the dot (.), dash (-) and underscode (_) characters only.
The folder ID must be unique.
The folder path cannot be blank.
The following intervals are used: for th: 使用下列的間隔：在第一個小時內每 30 秒保留一個版本，在第一天內每小時保留一個版本，在第 30 天內每一天保留一個版本，在達到最長保留時間前每一星期保留一個版本。
The maximum age must be a number and can: 最長保留時間最大必須為一個數字且不得為空。
The maximum time to keep a version (in d: 一個版本被保留的最長時間 (單位為天，若設定為 0 則表示永遠保留)。
The number of old versions to keep, per: 每個檔案要保留的舊版本數量。
The number of versions must be a number: 每個檔案要保留的舊版本數量必須是數字且不能為空白。
The rescan interval must be at least 5 s: 重新掃描間隔至少須為 5 秒。
Versions are automatically deleted if th: 當檔案歷史版本的存留時間大於設定的最大值，或是其數量在一段時間內超出允許值時，則會被刪除。
When adding a new device, keep in mind t: When adding a new device, keep in mind that this device must be added on the other side too.
When adding a new folder, keep in mind t: When adding a new folder, keep in mind that the Folder ID is used to tie folders together between devices. They are case sensitive and must match exactly between all devices.
您必須保留至少一個版本。
